definition: The word "öfter" refers to a comparative adverb that indicates a higher frequency or occurrence of an action or event. It is commonly used to describe the repetition of an activity or the increased regularity of something happening.

examples.english: I go to the cinema more often.

examples.german: Wir treffen uns öfter mit unseren Freunden.
examples.english: We meet up with our friends more often.
